Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.constants

Class BorrowConstants

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.librarymanagement.constants.BorrowConstants
public class BorrowConstants extends Object
This class holds constant values related to borrowing books in the library management system. It provides predefined values, Error Messages and Success messages.
